1-p.description: Cancel attacks for next turn (all animal attacks)
1-p.name: Cancel attacks

12-p.ability: Draw 2 cards from the main deck
12-p.description: Draw 2 cards from the main deck
12-p.name: Draw 2 cards

13-p.description: Sacrifice 1hp to return 2 animals to deck from animal graveyard
13-p.name: - 1hp to return 2 animals to deck

17-p.ability: Block opponent from using power cards

18-p.name: Return 1 animal to deck

3-p.description: Sacrifice 2 hp to revive any animal, can attack
3-p.name: - 2 hp to revive any animal

4-p.ability: - 3 hp to steal an opponent animal
4-p.description: Sacrifice 3 hp to switch side of an opponent animal

5-p.description: Sacrifice 1hp to Revive last animal card (can attack)
5-p.name: - 1 hp to Revive last animal card
